roleset.name: curve

role.descr: thing quirking at or in response to

example.name: transitive, all args
example.text: Here , too , she talked low , [*] quirking her head at one or another of theplaces , most often at Izaak 's armchair which []faced her across thelong table .
example.arg: at one or another of theplaces , most often at Izaak 's armchair which []faced her across thelong table

roleset.note: QUIRK-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from quirk.01-v)
